website_summaries.verdict: Easy to take on and off the pool surface, though its thin construction means its service life is only about one season.
pros: Light enough for one person to float onto the pool surface without breaking surface tension
Heats the pool surface quickly on sunny and on hazy days
Stays in place even on windy days
cons: Cover is a little smaller than its listed diameter
Doesn’t heat well in cooler climates

customer_reviews.title: Not Going to Last
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover because of the quality, durability and guarantee claims. This cover last 7 months then fell apart the manufacturer is non responsive. This is good temporary cover, but for the money look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Go bigger at least 2 sizes than your pool
customer_reviews.text: We have a 21’ above ground pool. The description said it was 2 to 3’ larger than size. So we didn’t buy a larger cover. Big mistake it barely fits our pool. I looked at the box as we did not get a invoice in the box. It said 21’ on it. It allows debris in our pool all the time. We are now going to purchase another cover that is bigger so we don’t continue having this problem. Our last one was more than big enough but the summer sun broke the material down so we purchased this one. Not liking it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Heats up the pool a good 5-10 degrees depending on sun, but now in the 3rd summer is coming apart ... Small circles of blue detach from the cover and it is easy to tear apart when putting on or off. So expect it to last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: princess posse

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few months ago. I live in a cool climate, upstate NY (most northeastern point of NYS). This cover has only been on my pool for a couple months and all the 'bubbles' are burst and little pieces of blue plastic/vinyl are everywhere in my pool. I would NEVER waste a dime on this product! It got one star only because you have to pick at least one. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought awhile ago. It's still hanging there, even after 2 years plus if season changes. As for weather it helps with heating the water? That is negligible at best
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: More hassle than Warmth
customer_reviews.text: It does get the top inch or so of the pool warm but it's still cold if you don't have the water circulating. I bought the 12' one for my 12' pool and it was so big I had to tuck it under which meant all the debris that accumulated over it would go right into the water. It would benefit from an elastic on it to fit better or something. Also, there was no direction on which was was up... (The flat side or bubble side) it seems like it was more of a hassle having this on the pool.
customer_reviews.author: MarriedMomOf3+GSD

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, thick material, put in right at end of season so will know more next year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like the product, just time consuming, installing and removal. But it works
customer_reviews.author: DONALD W. PORTER

customer_reviews.title: My second purchased
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to keep your above ground pool clean from fall debris and bugs while keeping the water warm. My first purchased lasted for about 2 years and since I really didn't take care of it by leaving it out in the sun and not stored it properly, it got dried up and fell apart. This pool cover along with the homemade solar pool heater, the water got very warm and perfect to swim in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: dbug

customer_reviews.title: Solar Pool Cover worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the Splash Pool Cover we received. It fits perfect on our Splash Pool. The sizing was exactly correct. It stays on our pool even with windy days. It was worth the money, every penny of it. Paid about $99.00 and this was a great buy compared to the other pool covers out there. We were happy with the packaging and shipping of this product. We received the pool cover when expected. Thanks Amazon.com for giving us such a deal on this pool cover.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my older solar cover for my 24' round pool. Yes, I realize I ordered A 21' but the last place I ordered from the 24 was so big I decided to go smaller. Anyway it is smaller still heats up the pool 10 to 15* higher and keeps dust out of pool. The gauge is also less then my last one but was recorded as the same quality but is a bit cheaper, hoping to get at least two summers from it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Garbo

customer_reviews.title: Round Solar Pool Cover, 27'
customer_reviews.text: Great solar cover, keeps leaves off the pool and keeps water from evaporating while were on vacation, just one complaint. It's peeling/shedding some of the bubble side of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: A quality cover that we are very pleased with. It does really use the sun to heat the pool during the day. At night, the cover keeps the heat in. We live in Texas where there is quite a bit of sun most of year. On average the pool heats about double what the sun would do alone without the cover.
customer_reviews.author: David Whitcher

customer_reviews.title: works great as expected
customer_reviews.text: We got a 12' pool for our child last year to introduce him to swimming however the temperature was almost always too cold for him to enjoy. I bought this solar cover to keep in the heat at night and warm during the day. Already we've been able to maintain temperatures in the mid-upper 80's. Works great and keeps the pool warm enough for my son to want to keep swimming.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. I only had it for 1 summer before I sold my house
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: It's a cover.
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I needed but really the min size sold. It's not made of the large bubbles, but a much smaller size. It has not torn, feels to be of decent quality. Use it for my spa to keep things out. For the price and what you get, think it's a good product, it will stand up to the test of time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Livermore, CA

customer_reviews.title: The cover is a little thinner than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is a little thinner than I expected. That makes it easier for one person to cover the pool. I do hope it holds up for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: TONI ARNSPIGER

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts for three months
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this 1 year ago and used it for the season, cleaned it and put it away. Pulled it out this year and the cover fell apart after using it for less than two weeks. SO I guess this is ok if you just throw it away at the end of the season and don't expect it to last for more than three months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Minch

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover! Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my mother's pool. She loves it. She says it makes her pool about 10 degrees warmer. However, I would suggest ordering a size smaller than you actually need, as this cover does run big (you can also trim it with scissors).
customer_reviews.author: angela mullins

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: This item took forever to arrive it was delivered either the last day it was supposed to or a day or so after I forget now. It works ok at heating the surface of the pool, but of course the bottom will still be cold. I got the 12 foot on purpose for my son's 10 foot pool so it will drape over and be easier to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Alex&Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Retains the heat in our indoor exercise pool
customer_reviews.text: Used indoors for our exercise pool. Works as intended and is durable even at the 8 mm version. I presume the 8 mm refers to the depths of the bubbles and not the thickness of the cover itself.
customer_reviews.author: GatorRay

customer_reviews.title: Great pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, keeps the dirt out of the pool. Easy to put on. The only draw back is it is larger than 12 ft around which I could cut it but it still works out fine. I lays right on top of the water and does not blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: ... winter time it did warm up the pool very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Can i play a lot but what I can tell you why it was floating around the pool in this winter time it did warm up the pool very happy with it. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Darrell R.

customer_reviews.title: Greaat value.
customer_reviews.text: This fit my pool correctly and did raise the temperature from 4 - 6 degrees. The price is way better than the price for the same locally. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: G W

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I debated installing a solar panel but decided to go with the cheaper blanket. To my surprise, the blanket is every bit as good as the panels. It keeps my 12x30 pool at about 86. Today, I put the cover on around noon (water temp was 80) and at 830 the pool is 86. Did i mention that part of the day was overcast? Perfect for the kids to dive in around 930. The blanket is a little larger than 12 feet, which is just fine. I'm going to try and use it on a 14x42 pool that I have standing by for later this summer. If you are debating a solar blanket I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LizardLvr

customer_reviews.title: Keep your pool warm!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of keeping the pool warm. Just run your pump and filter for a while before you get in the pool as the warm water tends to stay on top.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A

customer_reviews.title: solar pool cover
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it raises the pool temp 3 deg, and looks good. flat side up bubble side down.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd  Mc

customer_reviews.title: No GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one previously for almost 10 years. This one did not last 3 months. The bubbles collapsed as soon as it turned a little cooler and it would not float. If you want one to last for more than 3 months look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for Intex
customer_reviews.text: I have an intex pool which tapers at the top-one of the spash ones, this would be perfect if my pool were a true 12 foot, but a 12 foot intex is not 12 feet at the top. Still it works as described, but recommend buying an intext compatable one.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Actually DOES help warm the pool water and keep out ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually DOES help warm the pool water and keep out debris. Size was correct - not over sized as other reviewers had mentioned. It's our first summer using it so I can't speak to the durability yet. Hope it lasts...
customer_reviews.author: Teacher's Pet

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great. We take it on and off the pool without any issues - definitely think it helps keep the pool warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Grace & Olive's MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: This is not 12 feet. I measured. So it doesn't cover all the water. Disappointing, but I know others have had the same problem. Still helps warm it up, but it's just not what it should be. Buy from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Vrunk

customer_reviews.title: I have used a solar cover for 30 years on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used a solar cover for 30 years on 3 different pools. wouldn't think of having a pool without having a solar cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C.

customer_reviews.title: pool cover
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I got it fast and then put it on and the next day the pool was warmer and it helps to keep the dirt out of the pool I just was it off before putting it back on so all around I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nedra. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I attached the cover to a solar cover reel on a 21 ft above ground pool. It fits the pool,when cover is being applied it floats easily off the reel and does a good job of heating the pool.
customer_reviews.author: john hammond

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I've had it on for over a month and hadn't changed the temperature. It's basically just thick blue bubble wrap so not sure how that's suppose to work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: works good. windy and it still works good
customer_reviews.text: works good. windy and it still works good. heats the first 10 in. of water very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: I have a large spa attached to a pool and this cover works well. Had a bit of trouble making a "perfect circle" out of the large square, but it does the job. Floats great even in heavy rain. Cheap product to keep leaves and pine needles out of the spa.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL HOLLOWAY

customer_reviews.title: warmer water
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this solar cover on for two days and it has been mostly cloudy and cool but pool is already 6-8 deg. warmer than it was before.
customer_reviews.author: wolfmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was surprise on how heavy duty this product was for the price...I have a hot tub that we use in the winter and was told if you use a solar cover along with your hot tub cover it will help you save in energy costs... you can cut the cover to size to make it fit the hot tub and save $30 on other ones on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nuclear Rob

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COVER
customer_reviews.text: Advertises as a cover when it’s actially a solar blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this. It is a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This cover doesn't heat the pool, is very thin and a big waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect cut, works as a solar cover should, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solar pool cover given the cost. I was actually blown away by how nice it was given what Amazon charged me for it. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and really does warm the water up and keeps it warm.
customer_reviews.author: Marc E. Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Solar cover
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Thickness is right and fit my pool great.
customer_reviews.author: Thearsa Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Just a pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Not very good at heating the water. We had it on for several days but there was no real change in water temp. But works well to keep leaves etc out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Pavanjit S. Chhabra

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pool warm & clean!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for the price and quality. The pool cover thickness is not top notch but it is adequate, considering the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: nancy m.

customer_reviews.title: No more shrunken.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and an inline solar heater at the same time for our 12 foot above ground pool. The pump on my pool crapped out so the inline heater was doing nothing. However in about a week the pool warmed up to a temperature just below bath temps. My pool does get tons of afternoon sun. With this cover on, in a week the pool is at least 10 degrees warmer then it's ever been. As long as I can get the kids and wife to put it back on when they're done, I think we'll be set.
customer_reviews.author: aronf_53

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, a little hard for one person to put on or remove, but does the job!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Yeater

customer_reviews.title: Would have given five stars, but it was too ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given five stars, but it was too big for our 12-ft pool. Otherwise, it's exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Redbirdie

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our 12 ft. round pool perfectly. Works great and keeps the water warm. When this wears out, which it will eventually, I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool Cover
customer_reviews.text: We just love this cover. We have an in-ground spa and the temperature was always too cool for comfort. For the price of this cover we figured we did not have much to loose, if it didn't work. We trimmed it to fit the kidney shape of the spa, checked the temperature of the water when we covered the spa and waited 24 hours to check again. The temperature was a very comfortable 88 degrees and it fluctuated between 84 and 88 depending on how sunny the day was. It was worth every penny as we use the spa at night a lot more than we ever did before.
customer_reviews.author: pluma

customer_reviews.title: Best pool cover!
customer_reviews.text: It holds the heat in the water. It keeps the leaves out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: It was fine and server the purpose as temporary cover for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was fine and server the purpose as temporary cover for the pool. Didn't solve my problems, but I was not relying on this cover and ordered it only as a temporary solution before installing the permanent cover on my Jacuzzi.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly

customer_reviews.title: Pool cover works well, it does have a strange ...
customer_reviews.text: Pool cover works well, it does have a strange straight edge that takes off about a foot in one place that spans about 8 feet, but other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ed Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Cover so far is good, just put it on. Only complaint is that it was taped up to fit in the box with clear packing tape. When we removed the tape it pulled off the top layer with it. Not smart packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Works nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this product would increase the temperature of the pool i have. It does! I also keeps out bugs and other debris. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Warmth at last!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too keen about this product but after I got it, it actually heat up my Intex pool quite nicely!! Yes, its basically a giant bubble wrap but its heavy duty and does what its supposed to do. My kids and I love the water temperature by the time afternoon rolls in. After coming home from work and school its nice to jump in a comfortable pool temp.
customer_reviews.author: MugenTitan

customer_reviews.title: Keep the heat in, the leaves out
customer_reviews.text: Great product for great price. They last at least 2 seasons. I'm using 2 layers for extra heat retention when it starts to cool off. The first one I got, I trimmed to fit the above ground pool. The 2nd one I ordered, I left uncut so that there are 2" or more that rises up along the perimeter of the pool- this keeps the water from seeping over the edge of the cover and onto the top of the cover. Much more expensive in pool stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The cover heats up the pool nicely. It's a little hard to get in and out of the water, but we are working on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: i had high hopes, i bought this to replace the inflatable tube hot tub cover i had. It didnt work... cut perfectly to size, but didnt work. very thin. temp dropped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Like a heater!
customer_reviews.text: This solar cover works great!! However if you live in the south I doubt you will need it in the summer months unless you want a hot bath!! I cover only half the pool with the solar cover otherwise it gets way too warm and defeats the purpose of the pool. It is sturdy and fits a 12 foot pool perfectly! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angelfish

customer_reviews.title: bubble cover
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. If you let it lie in the water the water tension holds it down so you don't have to deal with the wind blowing it away. I have tried many covers and this is the only one that works in windy conditions. It does keep out leaves and most bugs. It is easy to remove and replace.
customer_reviews.author: BbGdrch

customer_reviews.title: The cover was easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: The cover was easy to put on and take off. It didn't seem to heat the pool, but did keep the pool from losing heat overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warms the pool
customer_reviews.text: Cover not big enough even though it stated it was to fit a 12ft round pool. However it does heat up the pool nicely. Would purchase again but recommend buying bigger then your actual pool size
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy (or flat) as other brands
customer_reviews.text: We currently have a similar pool cover that seems much sturdier--- ordered this because it was cheaper. The quality seems much more like a real bubble wrap than a pool cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rheeblers

customer_reviews.title: Getting warmer
customer_reviews.text: have had other solar covers and this is the thinnest one yet. It has been heating up our pool though and we will have to see how it holds up. Since it is thin it makes it easy to pull aside to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This solar cover increases the pool water's temperature and reduces skimming time by keeping leaves and bugs out! It doesn't cover the whole pool, just lays on top of the water, but still very affective
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Closterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 27 foot cover for 27 foot pool. It is exactly 27 foot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pelasky Jr

customer_reviews.title: Thin cover
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several solar covers over the years for the same 24' pool. This is a thin cover and I would not buy it again. I roll the cover and set it on the ledge of the pool while swimming. It is hard to roll by hand.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: It holds the heat well and fits well in the 12 foot version.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stasiowski

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover 4 years ago and it is totally shot. It was not 27' round to begin with, but after just four years everytime I pull it off, it rips another hole in it. I do not know the mil of this cover, but it does not hold up long. Just a gentle tug and my fingers go right thru it. Will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie A. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart and the tiny circles fell off and blew all over the place!  Don't buy from this vendor!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk came apart under the sun and did NOT perform as I wanted The wind blew all the little circles around the yard and I had to throw it out after one season Don't waste you money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: BTC

customer_reviews.title: did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: this just works. covers the whole pool and keeps the water warm...just works as expected. would have loved if there was some kind of elastic fitting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Devarshi K Kumar

customer_reviews.title: takes 3 people to put on & off  pretty much thick bubble wrap, & if on when it rains it sinks down in pool & lets all debris in
customer_reviews.text: It takes 3 people to put it on and off and its pretty much thick bubble wrap, and if its on when it rains it sinks down into the pool and lets all the debris in , and it does NOT HEAT the pool unless you leave it on for like a week and then it only heats the top 3-4 inches of water to luke warm.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for heating and keeping bugs and dust out
customer_reviews.text: Keeps bugs and dust out and helps warm our pool. Also pretty light to put on and remove. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great and does what it is meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: John J Lafrance

customer_reviews.title: Warms a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This pool cover really does the job to warm the pool several degrees, you will absolutely notice the difference. The top several inches of water felt like a jacuzzi (after having this cover on for a day or two) before mixing the water around. The cover I got was actually a little bigger than the pool so I didn't have the problem that some have mentioned about it being smaller than what they ordered.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: It worked great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in 2012; it did increase the temperature of the pool as advertised. The problem is that it only lasted one season, over 50% of the bubbles burst after only three months of use. I'm buying another cover this year; however I’m not planning to purchase the same one again. It's a great product but it only lasted one season, not recomended.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: solar cover
customer_reviews.text: the solar cover seemed durable, it was the proper size , it arrived quickly and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: At best we've seen ~4 degrees
customer_reviews.text: The product description claims the cover will produce a 15 degree temperature rise, but it doesn't come close. At best we've seen ~4 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: RPNJ

customer_reviews.title: NO HEAT
customer_reviews.text: This solar cover does not live up to all the hype from previous reviews. The water stays so cold, actually the pool water heats up faster and retains the heat if the cover IS NOT used. Would not purchase or recommend this to anyone. Very dissatisfied. Feels like I was lied to......
customer_reviews.author: Curious College Student

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: received this item way in May, but I just installed the pool today and opened the Brown - Generic box it came in, there are no Instructions on hot to use it and to my surprise its only Blue Bubble Wrap kind of material! There are no ends to tie - cannot figure out who this can stay on the pool without lifting off or tearing it! I tried returning it online today and received a of only getting PARTIAL refund as per RETURN POLICY !!!! Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Milan Patel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but a pain to fold and store away after use.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Really keep the pool heated
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cool area but this cover made my pool go from 72 degrees to 86 in one day. Glad i made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kdog

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is the best cover I have had. I can get it put back on by myself
customer_reviews.author: kathleen sandra hanson

customer_reviews.title: fradulent advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased what was advertised as a 12 foot cover, but was shipped one that was 11 feet one inch. This seller gave me a hassle about returning the product, but ultimately authorized the return. Then they claimed they never received the product that I shipped them back. It took the clout of American Express - the credit card I used to pay for the item, to get me my $37.30 back. Lesson learned - when returning a product, pay for delivery confirmation. And beware this seller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kittredge

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality I've ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! This “round” cover was just a piece of a rectangle cut without even using a round template. There is even a straight edge ( yes, on a round cover) There is no solid edging to grasp except on the straight edge. It is cut so poorly there is a several inch difference in a one foot section of the edge. It looks like a child cut it. I’ve been ordering solar covers for 20 years and know what to expect. In my opinion this item is not worth even the low price listed. I returned it and bought one from a different vendor. Hoping for better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Strand

product_meta.title: Splash Pools Round Solar Pool Cover, 21-Feet
product_meta.description:
Size:21-FeetFROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 21' round solar cover is made of durable resin and have thousands of tiny air bubbles designed to capture and transmit solar heat to your pool. A solar cover will keep your pool water cleaner by blocking out dirt and debris which will save on chemicals. Using a solar cover cuts water evaporation by up to 95% and prevents heat loss. The solar cover also takes advantage of the suns "free heat" that will result in, on average a 15° temperature rise.
feature_bullets: Designed to capture and transmit solar heat to your pool
Keep your pool water cleaner by blocking out dirt and debris which will save on chemicals
Cuts water evaporation by up to 95%

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
